  --ldr-height: 135px;
}

  height: 90px;

.molads_ldr_billboard_on #content .billboard_wrapper.billboard-watermark {
  background-image: url(//i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/i/charity/watermark.jpeg);
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  position: relative
}

    background-color: transparent;
    -webkit-transition: background-color 0.5s;
    transition: background-color 0.5s;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
            box-shadow: none;
  }

    background-color: #fff;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 20px 21px -21px #000;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 21px -21px #000;
  }

.google-sky {
  margin: 10px auto;
  width: 120px;
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.1em;
  overflow: hidden;
  _overflow-x: hidden;
}

.google-sky {
  _overflow: visible;
}

.google-sky .attribution div {
  border-bottom: 2px solid #003580;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.google-sky .attribution a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #003580;
  display: inline;
}

.google-sky .attribution span {
  display: none;
}

.google-sky .title {
  font-weight: bold;
  display: inline;
}

.google-sky a,
.google-sky span {
  display: block;
}

  text-decoration: underline;
}

  font-size: 0.8em;
  display: inline;
}

  word-wrap: break-word;
}

  padding: 10px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

}

}

  font-weight: bold;
}

  width: 100%;

  text-align: left;
}

@media all and (orientation: portrait) {
  #stickyBannerUnderlay {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0 !important;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 1002;
    text-align: center;

    display: -webkit-box;

    display: -ms-flexbox;

    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    top: auto;
    background-color: hsla(0,0%,100%,.8);
    padding: 90px 0 90px 0;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)!important;
            box-shadow: 0 0 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)!important;
  }

  #stickyBanner img, #stickyBanner iframe, #stickyBanner img, #stickyBanner object, #stickyBanner div {
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: block;
    bottom: 0;
  }
  
  #stickyBannerUnderlay .mol-ads-label-container {
    font-size: 2.5em;
    margin-left: 20px;
    top: -1.2em;
  }

  #stickyBannerUnderlay .mol-ads-label {
    background-color: hsla(0,0%,100%,.8);
    padding: 3px;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 -1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            box-shadow: 0 -1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px 12px 0 0;
  }

  .closeButton {
    -webkit-transform: scale(2.5);
            transform: scale(2.5);
    position: absolute;
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    top: -48px;
    right: 26px;
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg width='13' height='13' viewBox='341 8 13 13' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath fill='%234F4F4F' d='M354 9.31L352.69 8l-5.19 5.19L342.31 8 341 9.31l5.19 5.19-5.19 5.19 1.31 1.31 5.19-5.19 5.19 5.19 1.31-1.31-5.19-5.19z' fill-rule='evenodd'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");
    background-size: 13px 13px;
    background-position: 9px;
    background-color: hsla(0,0%,100%,.8);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 -1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
            box-shadow: 0 -1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px 0 0 0;
  }
}

/* With GPT every single channel will reserve the space for the billboard.
   If no billable ad is served, a house ad will. This one will include a TED code to turn the slot OFF in Campaign Manager */

.molads_billboard_on .billboard {
  height: 250px;
}

          box-shadow: 0 20px 21px -21px #000;
  z-index: 1;
}

}

    background-image: url("//i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2016/03/23/DOUBLE-MPU-1.com.jpg")
}

  background-color: #fff;
}

  #top { padding-top: 0; }

    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    display: block;
  }

    padding-top: 0;
    margin-top: 0 !important;
  }
}

  #top { padding-top: 0; }
  #stickyBanner { display: block; }
}

  display: none;
}
